head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths TOMASINO, ANGELO ANDREW

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths TOMASINO, ANGELO ANDREW

block.p: TOMASINO-Angelo Andrew. Beloved husband of Nancy. Devoted father of Joanne Scognamiglio and Christine Tomasino. Fond father-in-law of Gennaro Scognamiglio. Loving grandfather of Neil, Andrew and Nora. Longtime employee of the New York Times. Reposing at Hillebrand Funeral Home, 63-17 Woodhaven Blvd, Rego Park. Mass of Christian Burial Tuesday, 9:30 AM, St. Mary's Church. Interment Calvary Cemetery. Viewing hours Monday, 2-5 and 7-9 PM. In lieu of flowers donations to Jacob Perlow Hospice, 1st Ave. at 16th St., NYC 10003, and Families With Children From China Greater New York, PO Box 865, Ansonia Station, NY 10023.
